DOC.brief_summary: This study is to examine if there is improved sensitivity in detecting hepatic lesions using respiratory gating and if there is an improvement in confidence defining lesions as benign or malignant.
DOC.brief_title: PET Respiratory Gating to Detect Hepatic Metastasis in Patients With Colon Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients with colon cancer 18 years or older Signed Informed Consent Form Blood Glucose of 200 or less prior to scan Patients with known hepatic metastasis
